hero.title: Play TzDraft
hero.subtitle: Experience the beloved game of TzDraft online with friends or against the computer. Authentic gameplay, anywhere.

support.title: Support Center
support.subtitle: Have a question or run into a bug? We're here to help you get back to the game.

faqs.a1: TzDraft follows standard 8x8 Draughts rules. Pieces move forward diagonally. Pieces are removed when captured. Capture is mandatory.
faqs.q2: Can I play against my friends?
faqs.a2: Yes! Click 'Play Online' to create a game room, then share the Game ID with your friend.
faqs.q3: I found a bug, how do I report it?
faqs.a3: Please use the form below to describe the issue. Include the Game ID if applicable.
